|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM68B16CWQD-25H; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 1C:C6:3C, 84:9C:A6, 74:31:70 |oui = 1C:C6:3C, 84:9C:A6, 74:31:70

|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, J1 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43227;BCM43227; |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Also known as the '''Orange Bright Box''' or '''EE Bright Box 1''' in the UK.
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/ar7516 ''Arcadyan AR7516'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki]. :"141751620007J R01" and "1144" (11/2011) is silkscreened on the board in the photos.
See also [[Arcadyan ARV7519]] (Infineon/Atheros).. and [[Buffalo WBMR-HP-G300H]] (FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/RAXAR7516VW RAXAR7516VW])
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|broadcomwifi}} {{OpenWrtNotice|BCM63xxDSL}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/arcadyanastoria/arcadyanastoria_ar7516 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/ar7516 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=43883 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 17.01.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/dsl_modem DSL modem], [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/wifi_2.4ghz_partly WiFi 2.4GHz partly] |comment = aka EE Brightbox 1 }} Please insert instructions here
